mapper.select: select a.id id, a.name name, FORMAT(((a.story_score * 5 + a.role_score * 3 + a.img_quality_score * 3 + a.music_score * 1) / 12), 2) allScore, a.story_score storyScore, a.role_score roleScore, a.img_quality_score imgQualityScore, a.music_score musicScore, b.type environmentType, c.type type, d.type rebornType, e.type loveType, f.type branchType, g.type spType, a.sex_level sexLevel, a.language language, a.area area, if(a.status = 1, '已玩', '未玩') status from (((((galgame_main a left join galgame_type b on a.environment_type = b.id) left join galgame_type c on a.type = c.id) left join galgame_type d on a.reborn_type = d.id) left join galgame_type e on a.love_type = e.id) left join galgame_type f on a.branch_type = f.id) left join galgame_type g on a.sp_type = g.id where a.deleted = 0 and b.deleted = 0 and c.deleted = 0 and d.deleted = 0 and e.deleted = 0 and f.deleted = 0 and g.deleted = 0 and a.id = #{id}
